[Page Title: Indaco Atlanta]

Main content starts here, tab to start navigating 
Indaco Atlanta
Reservations Slide 1 of 4 Slide 2 of 4 Slide 3 of 4 Slide 4 of 4 hero gallery paused, press to play images slides Playing hero gallery, press to pause images slides 
Hours & Location
725 Ponce De Leon Ave NE Suite 250, Atlanta, GA 30306 (404) 205-5183 indacoatlanta@theindigoroad.com HOURS Bar Monday - Friday: Opens at 4 p.m. Dinner Sunday - Thursday: 5 – 10 p.m Friday + Saturday: 5 – 11 p.m. Weekend Brunch Saturday + Sunday: 11 - 2:30 p.m. Indaco Café [Grab-and-Go Options with Self-Serve Seating] 8 a.m. -  2:30 p.m. Monday - Friday: Order Pickup Catering Menu LOCATION 
Indaco is located on the office lobby level of the 725 Ponce building, accessible from the main building entrance off of Ponce de Leon or North Avenue, and from the Atlanta BeltLine Eastside Trail.
INDACO ATLANTA 
Located on the BeltLine, Indaco offers a blend of elevated and casual dining with a modern, Italian menu. Enjoy house-made pastas and wood-fired pizzas along with classic piatti, a fresh cocktail menu and an Italian-forward wine list.

For press inquiries, please contact Laura Craft at lecraft@theindigoroad.com
Facebook Instagram PARKING Guests have the option of complimentary self-parking, with parking tickets validated by request after your meal. Self-parking is located below the 725 Ponce building. Valet parking is available Thursday through Saturday. Kroger parking is monitored by a third party and is not affiliated with Indaco or The Indigo Road Hospitality Group. Please call us if you need extra assistance with parking/directions. Get Directions
